column4: ɔwo na muguan modɔ wo: Gye me fi hɔn a wotsiw me nyinara nsamu na yi me:"

column2: "Bɛyɛ na wɔaatsetsew me kra mu dɛ gyata
column4: ber a obi nnyi hɔ a obeyi me."
sɛ mafom; Sɛ emumuyɛdze bi wɔ me nsamu;"

column2: "Sɛ medze bɔn bi ayɛ nyia ɔnye me tse asomdwee mu a: Na medzi nyia ɔhaw me no mpo emim gyan ara a:"

column4: ma ontsiatsia mo nkwa do wɔ famu; Na ɔmfa m'enyimnyam nto huntuma mu."
Ma woho do tsia m'atamfo hɔn gyigyeegye yɛ: Na keka wo ho ma me; na ɔwo na ibu atsɛn."

column2: "Na ma aman mboanofo ntwa wo ho nhyia: Na fa hɔn do san kɔ sor."

column3: bu me atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ me tsenenee tse
column4: na mbrɛ bemdzi a ɔwɔ mo mu tse."

column3: ma emumuyɛfo hɔn emumuyɛ mbɔ adze
column4: na ma ɔtseneneenyi ntsim: Na ɔwo nye tsenenee Nyankopɔn a ihu akoma na adwen mu."

column3: Ɔno na ɔgye akoma mu tseneneenyi nkwa."

column4: Nyankopɔn a ɔda n'ebufuw edzi da biara."

column2: "Oesiesie owu adze so ama dɛm nyimpa no; Ɔyɛ n'egyen menaba ano ma ɔhye."

column4: Naaso ɔtɔ mona a noara tui no mu."

column2: "Mebɛda EWURADZE ase dɛ mbrɛ ne tsenenee tse: Na matow ayɛyindwom ama Ɔsorsor EWURADZE ne dzin."
